refnamediv.refpurpose: This function creates a ForeggroundDetector struct which is used to detect Foreground with Gaussian Mixture Models.

listitem.para: ForegroundDetector struct used to return a mask for the frame.
Default - true. A boolean denoting whether Learning Rate will be adapted after initial training frames.
Default - 150. A scalar, denoting the number of initial frames required to train the background model.
Default - 0.005. A scalar, denoting the learning rate of the background model.
Default - 0.7. To determine the background model, minimum background ratio can be provided.
Default - 5. This denotes the number of Gaussian models in the Gaussian Mixture Models.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function returns a ForegreoundDetector Struct which basically sets a background model and tracks changes in an input video frame with respect to the background and then computes the Foreground Mask.
